name: George Likes Lasagna
description:
Lasagna horror

Your parents will be late at work, so they asked you to cook a lasagna for dinner. What could went wrong?

Gameplay

In this game you will cook lasagna and meet the George. George really liked pizza, but he also a very shy dude (who can anyway break your pelvis)

Average playtime: about 10-15 minutes to achieve all endings

Features
  • simple but cool graphics
  • multiple endings
  • you can cook your own lasagna
Developer

Game by Serious Daniel (Daniel Oschepkov)

Made with Unity

some sounds are taken from zvukipro.com

some furniture models are taken from sketchfab
